Class GameController

java.lang.Object
islands.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements MouseListener
Controller for Islands of Hex game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(int size, Class<? extends SimulatedPlayer> whiteClass, Class<? extends SimulatedPlayer> blackClass, GameController.ViewDelegate viewDelegate)
      Constructs the controller for a game.
      Parameters:
      size - the size
      whiteClass - the white player (or null for a human player)
      blackClass - the black player (or null for a human player)
      viewDelegate - the view delegate

  • Method Details

    • toggleTurn

      public void toggleTurn()
      Change the turn from white to black or vice versa.

    • setDelegate

      public void setDelegate(GameController.ViewDelegate vd)
      Sets the view delegate.
      Parameters:
      vd - the view delegate

    • tryRowColFromPoint

      public void tryRowColFromPoint(RowColPair position)
      Tries to play a tile of the current color at the specified position.

      If the placement is successful, the score is updated, and the end of game condition is checked. If the game is over, the winner is announced; otherwise, the turn is toggled.

      If the position is not legal, this has no effect.

      Parameters:
      position - the requested position

    • tryRowCol

      public void tryRowCol(int row, int col)
      Tries to play a tile of the current color at the specified position.

      If the placement is successful, the score is updated, and the end of game condition is checked. If the game is over, the winner is announced; otherwise, the turn is toggled.

      If the position is not legal, this has no effect.

      Parameters:
      row - the requested row
      col - the requested column

    • stopAll

      public void stopAll()
      Stops the timer used to slow down simulated moves.
